article.section_title: White Noise Machine: Sleep Better with DRMN
article.content_html:
Looking for the best white noise machine? Turn your iPhone into a powerful, portable sound machine with DRMN. Whether you need white noise for sleep, soothing sounds for your baby, or a travel‑friendly noise machine, DRMN delivers high‑quality loops that run seamlessly all night.

Why use a white noise machine?

Consistent, broadband sound masks disruptive noises (traffic, neighbors, snoring) and helps your brain settle. Many people fall asleep faster and wake up less often with white noise or ocean waves.

DRMN: Your portable sound machine

  • White noise machine for sleep: classic white noise, plus pink and brown noise
  • Ocean waves sound machine: realistic surf with rich low‑frequency textures
  • Rain and fan sounds: gentle rain, storm, box fan, and more
  • For babies: calm fussiness with steady, gentle noise (use safe volumes)
  • Portable noise machine: no extra hardware—just your iPhone

How to get the best results

  1. Choose a sound you enjoy (white noise, ocean waves, rain, or fan)
  2. Set a comfortable volume—loud enough to mask noise, not to overpower
  3. Use the sleep timer or let it play all night

DRMN is designed to be your best white noise machine on iOS—simple, reliable, and always with you. Ready to sleep better?
